title: 798: BITCOIN CAN HIT $333K ‘PARABOLICALLY’ BY MAY 2022, IF THIS BTC PRICE FRACTAL PLAYS OUT!!
description:
Bitcoin could target a massive $333,000 by May 2022 if the U.S. Federal Reserve provides a "perfect storm" of low rates, a new BTC price prediction argues.

"To get there parabolically, we would probably need a perfect storm of the Fed being unable to raise rates (which are probably priced in) and heightened inflation, leading to a flight to safety in BTC."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
